item.title: Superflight
item.description: Image stolen from https://store.steampowered.com/app/732430/Superflight/ Cool game introduced to me by my friend Nate. The game lags a bit but is overall pretty playable on Linux. Run this launch option: PROTON_USE_WINED3D=1 %command%
